block.p: LEAD: FOLLOWING is a sampling of stores and markets in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut where shoppers can find fairly large selections of tomatoes. MANHATTAN Balducci's, 424 Avenue of the Americas (Ninth Street), 212-673-2600. Dean & DeLuca, 121 Prince Street (Greene Street), 212-431-1691.

FOLLOWING is a sampling of stores and markets in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut where shoppers can find fairly large selections of tomatoes. MANHATTAN Balducci's, 424 Avenue of the Americas (Ninth Street), 212-673-2600. Dean & DeLuca, 121 Prince Street (Greene Street), 212-431-1691. Greenmarkets in several locations offer some tomato varieties. (For information on the markets: 212-477-3220.) Here are three possibilities: Independence Plaza at Greenwich Avenue and Chambers Street (Wednesdays through Nov. 25 and Saturdays through Dec. 19); 102d Street and Amsterdam Avenue (Fridays through Dec. 18), and St. Mark's Church, 10th Street and Second Avenue (Tuesdays through Nov. 24). BROOKLYN Greenmarkets at Cadman Plaza West and Montague Street (Tuesdays through Dec. 22 and Saturdays year round), and at Flatbush and Atlantic Avenues (Wednesdays through Nov. 25). DUTCHESS COUNTY Henry Dykeman's Farm Market, Route 22, Pawling, N.Y., 914-855-5166.
Varieties include Mountain Pride, Star Pak and Jet Star. Closes Nov. 1. LONG ISLAND Green Thumb, Montauk Highway, Water Mill, 516-726-4989.
Sixteen varieties including Sun Ray, Floramerica, Supersonic and Main Pak. Open though mid-December. WESTCHESTER COUNTY Meadows Farm, 329 Underhill Road, Yorktown Heights, 914-962-4306.
Varieties include Beefsteak, Big Girl, Golden Jubilee, Pik-Red and Ramapo; also yellow and red cherry tomatoes. Closes Nov. 1. Stuart's Fruit Farm, Granite Spring Road, Granite Spring, 914-245-2784.

Varieties include Mountain Pride, Pik-Red and Star Pak. Open year round. CONNECTICUT Hay Day Farmer's Market, 1050 East Putnam Avenue, Riverside, 203-637-7600; 1026 Post Road East, Westport, 203-227-9008, and 1910 Black Rock Turnpike, Fairfield, 203-336-6865.
Varieties include Ace 55, Jet Star, Pik-Red, Supersonic and Sweet 100. All markets open year-round. NEW JERSEY Columbus Farmer's Market, Route 206, Columbus, 609-267-0400.
Open Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday year round.
